reviewText: I am collecting and watching all the Danielle Steel movies---I watch them over and over----Would like to See Message from Nam on DVD
The movie came in perfect condition.  I sat up until midnight watching it.  It is very, very good.  Thank you.
One of my favorite Danielle Steel mini-series.  I've watched it several times, and would recommend it to anyone who loves sweeping epic-type movies.

What a fake!
Zoya comes to audition to Diaghilev's company in Paris and tells to - hm.. well... looks like to Anna Pavlova: " Before I left Russia I  worked  for what you call here Kirov Ballet"...
 Sergei Kirov was a member of Russian Communist Party, he was killed in 1931 and only after that the former  Mariinsky Theatre was renamed in his honor.. I do not understand how such  mistake could be commemorated  in a relatively well done movie... But  probably it's worth it to buy this DVD just to enjoy hearing this line  over and over again...
Danielle  Steel is famous of not caring about historical facts, her other "Gem Of Fake " about Russia - "Granny Dan "...
Received in good time and in good condition

I wanted to see this film after watching on television another one of the films based on one of her books. What drew me to it was how Zoya escaped the fate of her family. If I could get a few of her books I want to read on dvd instead, I would buy them too.
It's almost as good as the book. Really worth the dough. However, some parts of the movie is pretty stiff.
I couldn't watch the dvd because it didn't work in my player.  I love the movie and I'm disappointed that I cannot watch the video!
Very happy with dvd.
Excellent service, and the movie is GREAT!

Excellent movie! Really enjoyed the setting and  the story.

I have always enjoyed reading Danielle Steel books and this was no exception.

My mom loves this movie and she been asking for months for me to locate this and first all I found was expensive ones. First all I found was ones on E-bay that was cost prohibitive. Then I found this here, and first I saw it for $70.00 new then it dropped to $50.00 new, however I took a chance with a used copy and couldn't be happier. It is near mint condition and I got it under $40.00 and this was a great find. Only issue I had was the DVD was not on the holder in the case. But the DVD does not have any scratches on it and we can see detail of the outfits worn in the movie. The VHS we had is wearing out after several years of playing. There are parts in the movie we seen that was not on the LMN version (cut for time on the channel).

Bought the Zoya DVD as a Christmas gift for my mother-in-law.  It's one of her favourites, mine too!  Received it in great condition and in plenty of time to mail it out with others in time for Christmas Day!
That's all I can say about this mini series is that it is a great one, I really enjoyed watching it.  It has a nice story line.....You will love it...

I'd been waiting to find Zoya on DVD for a long time.  I was so pleased to see this listed for I found it quite by accident.  I didn't hesitate to purchase it because I had previously had it on tape which eventually wore out.

It's a charming and heart felt story of a young girl who survives the Russian Revolution and the death of most of her family.  You will become enamored with the storyline and the joys and hardships of Zoya growing from a young girl into the matriarch of her children and grand daughter.

Don't think twice about purchasing this lovely story.  You won't be disappointed.
saw this years ago and loved it it was region 2 but i have a region player. loved it very much

I loved this movie and have owned it for years. How come it is so expensive to buy now?  The same with jewels.

Guess I better hang on to them since they are worth more than i paid for them.
Good dramatic film, though typical Danielle Steel. I enjoyed watching it (though it did have a rough spot on the DVD that I had to go back and skip over).
I enjoyed the quality of the film and the condition of the DVD. The movie was great and I recommend it to anyone interested in history and romance.
Great historical backdrop for a sad saga for characters so engaging with.love, loss, strength, endurance, life lessons unexpected but understood

I've only read 1 or 2 of D. Steels books/movies that I've really enjoyed.  This is definitely one of them.  Unlike many current movies it has a well written script that shows what the strength and determination of a woman can truly mean.  I love seeing Bruce Boxleitner and wife Melissa Gilbert acting together again.  They carried it for me.
I am glad to be collecting the dvds once again. When I need a good romance this is it. Great
Shows that heartship a women goes throught to survive, named my two dogs after this show Zoya and Sava Loved it

I had the opportunity to sit down and watch ZOYA in my own home last night.  It's very again very good.  And the copy I purchased from market place was GREAT!!!  I believe it was clearer than JEWELS.  Thank you much.  Kimmarie
Best movie I have seen from the author. The story itself was very entertaining. Just loved it. I also saw the Family Album which is also very good.
that one was fine , i always loved that movie , i enjoyed watching it , daniel steele movies are my no. 1
My wife will love this stocking stuffer and force me to watch with her but that's ok because she's got a nice Christmas surprise thanks to your delivery.

The movie is very interesting with the real life couples Melissa Gilbert and Bruce Boxleitner portraying their very own characters and they are also three of my most favorite actors are in this movie which is Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and  Philip Casnoff . I think Sasha and Zoya have a good relationship with each other until her father Clayton has died which was very sad to her especially her mother Zoya which Sasha does not think her mother is thinking about him and also when her mother has found second love with Simon Hirsch. I think she is acting so rebelious because of Simon Hirsch and Matthew coming between their relationship with them and also does not spend enough time with her because of him and her work. Also when Zoya have to raise her grandchild, opens up her own store, retires from working at her store and also returns to her hometown with her granddaughter Zoe at the end of the film. The sad part of the movie is when her brother Nicky along with her parents has dies in the war in Russia, she and her grandmother Evengia has moved to Paris to lived there during the war and also tries to arrange marriage to Zoya to marry Vladimir which she does not love and also is a good friend to her and her grandmother. Also I did like it when she quit her night job as a stripper and worked at the department store to support her children. It was sad when she has to raise them alone when Clayton has died. She had to sell everything to pay off the debts and she and her children had to life in an apartment which was on fire. Sasha has adored her father a lot and she thinks her mother does not love him or pay any attention to her because of her second love with Simon Hirsch which she hates very much and also became very rebellious because of that. When she works at the Ballet Russe in Paris a ballerina and also meets her first love which is Captain Clayton Andrews and falls very deeply in love with him for the first time which her grandmother does not approve, also when her uncle Feodor has died, when she and Clayton marry and moves to America after the death of her grandmother also when her daughter Sasha dies in a car accident & has to raise her granddaughter, Zoe, when she and her children were in the fire also survived it and their dog Sava has died in the fire which was very sad and also saved their lives and also when Zoya works at night as a stripper for her and her children can survive and also gets a job at a local dress store. Also at the end of the movie Zoya has retired from the store& also returns to her hometown St. Petersburg,Russia with her granddaughter, Zoe. Danielle Steel Zoya along with Changes, Safe Harbour, Fine Things, Family Album, Jewels, Daddy, Once in a Lifetime and Remembrance are ten of my most favorite movies to watch on DVD which I have and they are my soap operas and I watch them as often as I can especially the full lengths ones which are Zoya, Fine Things, Jewels and family Album on special holidays like Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Eve.
The movie was very good, the only thing bad was that the DVD kept pausing.  That made watching it very annoying.

Received DVD immediately.  I guess it is a TV series that was taped and then transferred to DVD because the quality of the film was not ideal.  But still worth the price because my mother really wanted the story.

I absolutly loved the movie? Bruce Boxleitner and Melissa Gilbert did a wonderful job.
portraying their character's. And Danielle Steele is a fabulous author.

I received the dvd from Europe and couldn't play it because wasn't to play because of code only for Europe. Was very disappointed and will never order anything else that comes from Europe. This is the second time this has happened. Mr Paul Butler
Fast delivery, excellent condition and great video! We watched the entire Movie without any problem. Clear Sound and Picture. Thank you!!! I wiould buy from this buyer again!! ;)
Good, but somewhat trite Danielle Steel genre. Still deserving of 4 star rating.

I watched this TV miniseries when it first was shown on TV and loved it.  I was thrilled to finally find it on DVD.  There is another wonderful TV miniseries titled "Evergreen" starring Leslie Ann Warren that I would love to see on DVD.  You don't see great dramas like these available often or shown on TV.

This has always been one of my favorites of Danielle Steel. I had been trying to find it on DVD for a long time. It's was as good as I remembered .
Fabulous movie.  Worth watching.

Still one of my favorite old books of Danielle Steele and since I don't read much anymore it was nice to revisit the story.
